description: While we were traveling across the states, looking for good looking and sexually outgoing guys, we ran into A.J. He's a straight 24 year old that that works at a well known home improvement store.We were impressed by his strength when we saw him helping an old lady stack lumber onto the roof of her car. One of our people passed him a card, telling him what we do and what we wanted him for. A.J. had a great attitude and was eager to show himself off. So we set him up in a bed room, gave him a tube of lube and stated to film. He's very comfortable on the camera and you can tell he loves stroking himself. Like all Next Door Male scenes, A.J. moves from the couch, to the shower and then to the bed, where he relieves his balls all over his stomach.He had a good time and we hope you do too...Enjoy this weeks Next Door Male, A.J!
title: A.J.
